entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] REGNUM_AMBIENT_SP not properly handled in debugging information #77089
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.WorkItemExecution failing with Internal CLR error on Win x86 #77087
  • [API Proposal]: ICopyable<T> #77077
  • [mono] Investigate raising interpreter inlining threshold #77073
  • Support loop cloning of class member arrays #77071
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT RC2 crash with GVMs on linux-x64 #77070
    7.0.x

Closed

  • VS Code failed to run .NET runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 on WSL2 #77048
  • [API Proposal]: Pattern matching with Span<char>/ ReadOnlySpan<char> with specified casing and culture #76441
    Future
  • `TypeLoadException`: Struct used as a generic argument for a value type #77074
  • Blazor WASM crashes after a time with Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/../sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:91 558006 @ dotnet.6.0.0.csqdfrwtlv.js:1 #62054
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused extension #77088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add "_generated.*" suffix to some auto-generated files #77083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Cleanup file descriptions baked into Windows unmanaged .dlls #77080
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update comment #77075
    community-contribution
  • Updated NugetProjectModelVersion from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2. #77057
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixed a typo in a variable name #77062
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Emit ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished for dynamic modules #77068
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] switch to Json source generators Raising a new error Method not found: 'Void System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonSerializerContext..ctor #2040
  • NativeAot web core api custom error return code error System.Reflection.MissingMetadataException #2037

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new: Find repo and commit of template #28612
  • Make classes sealed by default #28610
  • Sometime multiple workload restores are required #28609
  • WorkloadManifest.targets should be imported in a pre-determined order for `7.0` #28607
    7.0.0

Closed

  • vs2022 not working with sdk 7.0.100 #28602

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Caller-Information-like Attribute to inspect nullability of generic type parameter values at runtime #64755
  • CS9057 The analyzer assembly references version '4.4.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.3.0.0' #64754
  • SourceGenerator: A way to include files from a dependant project? #64753

Closed

  • 'Go to Definition' Context-Menu option #64702
  • StringSyntax only applies to the first string argument when used with params. #64756

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor LSP server exit / shutdown / dispose logic for resiliency and clarity #64752
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • VB: Align design around speculative semantic models with C#. #64751
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64759
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Recover from the Exception in IdleProcessor #64746
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: endpoint, plaintext_actix, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44572
  • Perf improvement: single_query #44571
  • Blazor wasm hosted in a subfolder doesn't hot reload on changing #44568
  • LINQ Select returns wrong count of a ICollection<T> #44566
  • @microsoft/signalr - HubConnection onclose event causing app crash on iOS devices. #44564
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #44563

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44556
  • DotNetCore API hosted via Azure App Service is stripping leading url encoded forward slash from route values. #44461
  • Blazor WebAssembly - Single Sign Out not working #44495
  • Follow up on: UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44545
  • The synchronous method is not supported by 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler' #44464
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IPNetwork.Parse and TryParse #44573
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Uri StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44570
    community-contribution
  • Improve MapGroup link generation test #44562

Merged

  • Add CompositeFormat StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44555
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Override Send in TestHost.ClientHandler #44550
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
  • Adds dialog form method to FormMethod enum #44500
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Test: convert FromSql tests to use query infra #29365
  • It has an endless loop, and its ideal result is the same as "Teacher=null", because I have no Include. #29364
  • Data migration using Parallel.For #29363

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29355 - FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29366

Merged

  • Use C# 11 raw SQL literals for all SQL baselines #29350
    tell-mode
  • Update DailyBuilds.md #29362

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created
